attributes.actor: Karl JacksonAn '''Unsullied''' is an unnamed minor character in the Season 4

sections.Biography:
===Background===
He's an [[Unsullied]], [[slavery|enslaved]] and [[eunuch|castrated]] as a child and submitted to a cruel training by the [[Good Masters]] of [[Astapor]]. He was made a free man after [[Daenerys Targaryen]] bought 8,000 Unsullied and had them [[Sack of Astapor|sack]] Astapor. Like the rest of his fellow Unsullied, he chose to fight for her, participating in the [[Battle of Yunkai|liberation]] of the entire slave population of [[Yunkai]].

===[[Season 4]]===
He is one of the [[Unsullied]] who dress themselves up as slaves and infiltrate into [[Meereen]] under [[Grey Worm]]'s lead during the [[Siege of Meereen]]. They persuade a group of skeptical slaves to revolt against their [[Great Masters|masters]].<ref>"[[Oathkeeper]]"</ref>
